message.body: we're back home now. what's your day look like tomorrow? where are you staying tonight and what time do you need to get going back to philly?
Hey. Thinking about going back to gun powder river tomorrow. I saw so many chanterelles there today but I didn't have a bag. No schedule, just give me a call or I'll call you tomorrow
I'm staying a Phill's I might leave Monday morning or later tomorrow evening
Wildlands loop swimming hole. Belair and miller
sounds perfect. talk to you in the morning.
zozo usually takes a nap somewhere in the middle of the day. wakes up around 1 or 2. want to go then?
We're gonna head over there shortly. Do you wanna meet us at the swimming hole? Do you know where I'm talking about? Blue trail to yellow trail
I think so, is it where you and I went before? from the parking lot you go west, through the tunnel under belair road then along the river? I'll look at some maps, I'm sure we can find it.
Yeah under the tunnel then blue to yellow trail with river on your left. I text u route to make sure
I can also meet you closer if it's too far to carry Zoey
we have a backpacky carrier thing so we should be ok, especially with two of us. and with the trail marks I'm sure we can find it. she's asleep now I can let you know when we get to the parking lot.
Blue trail to yellow. Cross the creek at all the downed trees that are blocking the path
sounds good. leaving the parking lot now
